content:
{"name": "The UpCounty Hub", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Apply online at" https://mymdthink.maryland.gov/home/#/sunbucks
To Apply: Contact Case Manager Stephanie Rodriguez at srodriguez@theupcountyhub.org or call 240-912-1052

Attach all requirements below to email.

Requirements
* IDENTIFICATION - One of the following for all members applying. License, Passport, Birth
Certificate(ONLY FOR KIDS APPLYING).

* INCOME - One of the following for adults applying. Paystubs (1 month), Letter from employer
should include: Name, Phone number, Salary, how many hours.

* ADDRESS - One of the following. Apartment lease, Letter from landlord, should include:
Landlord's name, phone number, how long tenant has been living there, rent amount.

* BILLS - Copies off: Water, electricity, gas, etc.

* SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER - For all members who have one and are applying.

* MIGRATION STATUS - Either Work permitted letter OR Residence card.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.theupcountyhub.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "12900 Middlebrook Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Germantown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20874", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.179015, "longitude": -77.269107}, "phones": [{"number": "(240) 912-1077", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}]}
